sentences.sContent: So for example, tags like  or  must have a closing bracket as shown in Listing 8, taken from the above JSP.
sentences.sContent_eng: So for example, tags like or must have a closing bracket as shown in Listing 8, taken from the above JSP.
sentences.sCn: 所以，例如，从上面的 JSP 接受的如  或  这样的标记必须有一个闭括号，如清单 8 所示。

sentences.sContent: When we detect an open bracket, we have found the start of a tag and return the collected characters after we have reversed their sequence.
sentences.sContent_eng: When we detect an open bracket, we have found the start of a tag and return the collected characters after we have reversed their sequence.
sentences.sCn: 当检测到一个开括号时，我们就找到了一个标签的开头，并将收集到的字符在逆转顺序之后返回。

sentences.sContent: Well, the bracket notation means you can index into this variable.
sentences.sContent_eng: Well, the bracket notation means you can index into this variable.
sentences.sCn: 好的，这个括号的意思是你可以,索引这个变量。

synos.tran: 支架；括号；墙上凸出的托架
括在一起；把…归入同一类；排除

phrases.pCn: 钢支架，钢角码；钢制肘板

trans.tranOther: one of the pair of signs ( ) put around words to show extra information
